Expansion based on:

  • Score Category v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)
  • NullFlavor v2.0.0 (CodeSystem)
CodeSystemDisplayDefinition

painhttps://www.hl7belgium.org/fhir/CodeSystem/be-cs-score-categoryPain scorePain score
OTHhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavorother**Description:**The actual value is not a member of the set of permitted data values in the constrained value domain of a variable. (e.g., concept not provided by required code system). **Usage Notes**: This flavor and its specializations are most commonly used with the CD datatype and its flavors. However, it may apply to \*any\* datatype where the constraints of the type are tighter than can be conveyed. For example, a PQ that is for a true measured amount whose units are not supported in UCUM, a need to convey a REAL when the type has been constrained to INT, etc. With coded datatypes, this null flavor may only be used if the vocabulary binding has a coding strength of CNE. By definition, all local codes and original text are part of the value set if the coding strength is CWE.

OTHhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavorOther**Description:**The actual value is not a member of the set of permitted data values in the constrained value domain of a variable. (e.g., concept not provided by required code system). **Usage Notes**: This flavor and its specializations are most commonly used with the CD datatype and its flavors. However, it may apply to \*any\* datatype where the constraints of the type are tighter than can be conveyed. For example, a PQ that is for a true measured amount whose units are not supported in UCUM, a need to convey a REAL when the type has been constrained to INT, etc. With coded datatypes, this null flavor may only be used if the vocabulary binding has a coding strength of CNE. bathing-dep-1Le patient a besoin d'une aide partielle pour se laver au dessus ou en dessous de la ceinture

All codes from system http://example.org/cs-mkatz

CodeDisplayDefinition
transferring-dep-0Le patient est autonome pour le transfert et se déplace de façon entièrement indépendante, sans auxiliaires mécaniques, ni aide de tiers
transferring-dep-1Le patient est autonome pour le transfert et ses déplacements moyennant l'utilisation d'auxiliaires mécaniques (béquilles, chaise roulante, …)
transferring-dep-2Le patient a absolument besoin de l'aide d'un tiers pour au moins un des transferts et/ou ses déplacements
transferring-dep-3Le patient est grabataire ou en chaise roulante et dépend entièrement des autres pour se déplacer

  • ActReason v2.0.0 (CodeSystem)
CodeSystemDisplayDefinition
OTHERhttps://www.hl7belgium.org/fhir/CodeSystem/be-cs-vaccination-status-reasonOther
ALLERGYhttps://www.hl7belgium.org/fhir/CodeSystem/be-cs-vaccination-status-reasonAllergy to vaccine ingredient
OSTOCKhttps://www.hl7belgium.org/fhir/CodeSystem/be-cs-vaccination-status-reasonOut of stock or no vaccine available
IMMUNEhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReasonImmune**Definition:**Testing has shown that the patient already has immunity to the agent targeted by the immunization.
MEDPREChttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReasonMedical Precaution**Definition:**The patient currently has a medical condition for which the vaccine is contraindicated or for which precaution is warranted.
OSTOCKhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReasonOut of Stock**Definition:**There was no supply of the product on hand to perform the service.
PATOBJhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReasonPatient Objection**Definition:**The patient or their guardian objects to receiving the vaccine.
